seo.title: Kinship | Form Parenting Crews with Intention and Clarity
seo.description: Build parenting crews outside traditional marriage. Align on values, coordinate legal and medical planning, activate agreements at conception. Family accountability before state intervention.

app.title: Dashboard | Kinship
app.description: Manage your parenting crews, track formation progress, and connect with crew members.

profile.title: Profile | Kinship
profile.description: Manage your Kinship profile and switch between demo personas.

crews.title: My Crews | Kinship
crews.description: View and manage your parenting crews on Kinship.

crewDetail.title: {name} | Kinship Crew
crewDetail.description: View crew details, chat with members, manage documents, and track accountability for {name}.

compass.title: The Compass | Find Your Crew | Kinship
compass.description: Browse and connect with potential parenting crew members. Filter by values, location, and match score.

settings.title: Settings | Kinship
settings.description: Manage your notification preferences and account settings on Kinship.

legal.title: Legal Documents | Kinship
legal.description: Manage your co-parenting agreements, legal templates, and crew documents.

login.title: Sign In | Kinship
login.description: Sign in to access your Kinship dashboard and manage your parenting crews.

hero.title: Form parenting crews with intention, clarity, and lasting support.
hero.description: Assemble a crew to raise children together. Align on values. Define clear roles. Create stability every child deserves.
hero.subtext: Responsibility begins at conception, not at romantic commitment.

highlights.values: Align on parenting values before you start
highlights.planning: Coordinate legal, medical, and care planning together
highlights.intention: Build crews like bands: intention, not accident
highlights.contracts: Contracts activate at conception, not at weddings
highlights.exit: Exit with dignity when circumstances change

hero.imageAlt: Diverse multigenerational crew planning together with children present

problemSolution.title: Romance gates parenthood. Children pay the price.
problemSolution.description: Society bundles three incompatible needs into marriage: romantic passion, lifelong commitment, and legal enforcement. When romance fails, the entire structure collapses. Kinship unbundles these needs so families form through intention instead of accident.

problem.title: Passion is volatile. Partnership needs stability. Law demands clarity.
problem.description: Marriage forces these incompatible forces together. When desire fades or conflict arises, the legal and parenting structure collapses with it. Children lose stability because adults could not sustain romance.
problem.imageAlt: Abstract visualization of incompatible systems forced together

points.noFramework: No clear framework for family planning

solution.title: Separate romance from responsibility. Activate agreements at conception.
solution.description: Form crews around shared parenting goals, not romantic chemistry. Legal agreements activate when pregnancy begins, not when vows are spoken. Responsibility transforms when life changes, but never disappears.
solution.imageAlt: Abstract visualization of harmonious unbundled systems

points.clearFramework: Clear, structured framework for all parties
points.exitStrategies: Exit strategies built from the start

compass.title: The Compass: Discover your crew
compass.description: Kinship combines the ease of modern matching apps with the rigor intentional families need. The Compass puts values and vision first, then surfaces people seeking the same journey.

values.title: Values come first
values.description: Browse crew profiles that lead with parenting philosophy, not photos. Compatibility shows before attraction.

dimensions.title: Six dimensions of alignment
dimensions.description: See where you match and where early conversations matter. No single score hiding incompatibilities.

structure.title: Structure before chemistry
structure.description: Complete guided discussions on hard topics before chat unlocks. Surface disagreements early.

productLayers.title: Six layers. One complete system.
productLayers.description: Traditional family formation leaves gaps between legal preparation, medical coordination, and emotional alignment. Kinship provides structure for every conversation and decision your crew needs to make together.

identity.title: Identity
identity.description: Document who you are: names, pronouns, cultural context, and the story you want to tell together.

values.title: Values alignment
values.description: Surface shared goals, relationship boundaries, and family rituals through guided conversations.

biological.title: Biological planning
biological.description: Coordinate fertility pathways, health history, and medical decisions with full transparency.

legal.title: Legal preparation
legal.description: Generate co-parenting agreements that activate at conception. Track consent and legal checkpoints.

accountability.title: Family accountability
accountability.description: Establish intervention protocols for behavioral issues. Respond as a crew before courts get involved.

support.title: Ongoing support
support.description: Maintain alignment through regular check-ins, milestone reviews, and structured conflict resolution.

howItWorks.title: From first conversation to first birthday
howItWorks.description: Kinship guides you through each stage of crew formation. Slow, deliberate decisions replace rushed commitments made under romantic pressure.

discover.label: Discover
discover.content: Meet potential crew members through values-first profiles. Complete compatibility assessments before making contact.

align.label: Align
align.content: Work through guided conversations on parenting philosophy, finances, boundaries, and long-term expectations.

formalize.label: Formalize
formalize.content: Generate legal agreements with your crew. Establish consent checkpoints and documentation for court recognition.

sustain.label: Sustain
sustain.content: Maintain crew alignment with regular check-ins, milestone reviews, and mediation support when conflicts arise.

whoItsFor.title: Kinship is for people who want children and a team, not a romance.
whoItsFor.description: Kinship helps people form families with intention, clarity, and shared responsibility.

quotes.primary: Kinship helps people form families with intention, clarity, and shared responsibility.
quotes.secondary: You donâ€™t need a romantic partner to raise a child well. You need aligned adults who are willing to commit to the same long-term project.

whoItsFor.notFor: Kinship is not for people who broke up with their partners. It is for people who want children but could not find the right partner and want a committed parenting crew instead.

audience.intentional: People who want children but not traditional coupling
audience.contributors: People who want to contribute without romance
audience.clarity: People who want clarity before commitment

familyAccountability.title: Family accountability before state intervention
familyAccountability.description: Those who commit at birth stay responsible for guiding, correcting, and intervening when challenges arise. Kinship provides the structure to respond as a crew before courts step in with punishment.

logging.title: Incident logging
logging.description: Document behavioral patterns with severity assessment. Track what interventions work over time.

protocols.title: Escalation protocols
protocols.description: Required actions at each severity level. Primary parent responds first, full crew mobilizes for serious issues.

documentation.title: Court documentation
documentation.description: Generate reports showing proactive family care if legal intervention becomes necessary.

governance.title: Legal protection built into every step
governance.description: Kinship generates legally sound documentation from the start. Agreements activate when pregnancy begins, establishing responsibility before birth instead of scrambling for protection after separation.
governance.imageAlt: Professional diverse governance and legal support team

consent.title: Consent at every threshold
consent.description: Document explicit agreement at formation, conception, birth, and major life changes. No assumptions about continued participation.

responsibility.title: Responsibility percentages
responsibility.description: Assign decision authority and financial obligation by percentage. Extended family can hold defined support roles.

exit.title: Exit with transformation
exit.description: Responsibilities adjust when life changes, never vanish. Mediation before exit, child continuity plans required.

testimonials.title: Real crews. Real outcomes.
testimonials.description: Families using Kinship to form intentional crews and raise children outside traditional marriage structures.

first.quote: Kinship gave us language for expectations we did not know how to express. Legal prep felt supportive instead of adversarial.
first.name: Jules & Avery

second.quote: The values framework helped us honor our identities while handling practical details. We aligned before conception.
second.name: Rina, Sam & Jordan

third.quote: Having my mother formally in the crew changed everything. The governance structure gave her voice without overstepping.
third.name: Marcus, Lee, Jordan & Rita

cta.imageAlt: Multigenerational crew with children walking toward bright future
cta.title: Ready to form your crew?
cta.description: Start with values alignment. Build legal protection from day one. Maintain support through every transition.
cta.primaryAria: Start building your crew on Kinship

footer.tagline: Form parenting crews with intention, clarity, and lasting support.
